    Appendix 0) README

    Nathan Brouwer | brouwern@gmail.com | @lobrowR

    2018-12-06

    Appendix-0-README.Rmd

    Files in this directory

    1. Appendix-0-README.Rmd
    2. Appendix-1a-raw_data.Rmd: Description of raw data file
    3. Appendix-1b-raw_data (.xlsx, .csv, other): raw data or placeholder for raw data
    4. Appendix-2-data_cleaning.Rmd: Code and/or description of data cleaning process to produce analysis data (optional in 2018)
    5. Appendix-3a-analyis_data.Rmd: Description of analysis data
    6. Appendix-3b-analyis_data.csv: cleaned data read for analysis
    7. Appendix-4a-graphical_exploratory_analyses.Rmd: graphical exploration of the data using boxplots, histograms etc.; follows general format of Zuur et al 2010
    8. Appendix-4b-numeric_exploratory_analyses.Rmd: Numeric summaries of data, including group means and correlations. Follows recomendations found Zuur et al 2010 (eg checking correlations to understand collinearity) and Gerstner et al 2017 (presenting summary information to facilitate meta-analysis.)
    9. Appendix-5a-study_design.Rmd: Description of study design and/or code to create study diagram. Follows recommendations of Zuur & Ieno 2016 and Gerstner et al 2017
    10. Appendix-5b-study_diagram (.pptx, image): Diagram of study site, experimental design, visual protocl, etc.
    11. Appendix-6a-analysis_script.Rmd: Script to replicate all analyses
    12. Appendix-6c-model_diagnostics_and_outliers.Rmd: Code to carry out relevant diagnostics for models (Can be part of main analysis script)
    13. Appendix-6d-primary_figure.Rmd:code to create primary figure for paper (can be part of main analysis script)
    14. Appendix-7-robustness_check.Rmd: to to carry out robustness check / sensitivity analysis on analysis.
    15. MS-1-Introduction.Rmd
    16. MS-2-Methods.Rmd
    17. MS-3a-Results-written.Rmd
    18. MS-3b-Results-model_equation.Rmd
    19. MS-3c-Results-key_figure.Rmd
    20. v-FAQ.Rmd: Frequently Asked Questions about finishing the independent .Rmd
    21. w-reference: misc. references related to tasks & concepts discussed in the above files.Rmd
    22. y-creating_the_package: functions run to create basic packge infrastructure.Rmd
    23. z-build_and_rebuild_package: code run to update and (re)build the package.Rmd

    Refernces

    Zuur et al 2010 A protocol for data exploration to avoid common statistical problems. Methods in Ecology & Evolution 1:3-14.
